attributes.action: Hold a general election in 2017, as soon as administratively feasible
attributes.additional_details: In 2007 when Gordon Brown took office, Theresa May said that we need a general election as he has no democratic mandate and his reputation has been tainted by his mistakes in office.
attributes.background: In light of recent events, both domestically & globally, we the people, call for a general election.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/168650
